name: Delivery (Jefry95, Nadberry, VanessaR098)
description:
Art 108 Sect 02 FA 21

Welcome to Delivery! The people of your town still need packages on the night of Halloween! Avoid the mysterious creatures of the night to get all the packages and deliver them to the residents. Keep the customers happy! 

Note: Common Bug - If ghost Fox is not shot, it can trap you in a corner. If that happens, you must refresh the page.  Player data will still be saved. 

--------------------------------------------

Artist, Designer: Nadine Delacruz

Primary Programmer: Bryse Rochester

Producer, Secondary Programmer: Vanessa Rivera

-----------------------------------------------

Keyboard Controls 

On World Map 

  • A/D or Left and Right Arrow Keys -  Choose between Levels
  • Enter - Play Level

On Level

  • WASD -Move Around
  • Left Mouse Click - Shoot 

------------------------------------------------

Music Credits 

Main Menu/World Map Background Music --> Select by  Patric Patrikios 

Level Background Music --> Forget Me Not  by Patric Patrikios
